title: How to Make Paprika Hendl

steps.headline: Heat up the oil or butter in a pot.
steps.description: Add chopped green chile, chopped onions and sugar. Sauté until the onions caramelize and turn reddish brown.

steps.headline: Add finely chopped garlic and sauté until it turns brown.
Add the chicken, 1 tablespoon of paprika and chili powder to the mixture.
steps.description: Mix it well. Add salt and fry for 5 minutes.

steps.headline: Add tomato puree and cover the pan.
steps.description: Allow to simmer on low heat for about 45 minutes.

steps.headline: Mix the remaining paprika, flour and sour cream with a blender.
steps.description: Alternatively combine the ingredients in a bowl and stir for about a minute.

steps.headline: Pour the sauce over the chicken.
steps.description: Sprinkle the black pepper over the entire dish. Give a good stir, then add the finely chopped coriander leaves. Cover with the lid and let it simmer for ten minutes.

steps.headline: Serve the chicken with sauteed bacon and mushroom tortellini.

text: Cut chicken into serving-size pieces.  Heat up the oil or butter in a pot. Add chopped green chile, chopped onions and sugar. Sauté until the onions caramelize and turn reddish brown. Add finely chopped garlic and sauté until it turns brown.  Add the chicken, 1 tablespoon of paprika and chili powder to the mixture. Mix it well. Add salt and fry for 5 minutes. Add tomato puree and cover the pan. Allow to simmer on low heat for about 45 minutes. Mix the remaining paprika, flour and sour cream with a blender. Alternatively combine the ingredients in a bowl and stir for about a minute. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Sprinkle the black pepper over the entire dish. Give a good stir, then add the finely chopped coriander leaves. Cover with the lid and let it simmer for ten minutes. Serve the chicken with sauteed bacon and mushroom tortellini. Enjoy! !
